title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing manna and quail in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing manna and quail in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person in a dream sees quail in a dream, this indicates good deeds and righteous deeds that the dreamer has performed. Also, seeing manna and quail indicates obedience to God Almighty, repentance from all sins and disobedience, and the removal of worry and sorrow. Seeing quail in a dream As it flies, it is a sign of betrayal of a friend in life and hard work, and God knows best. Seeing a manna bird for an unmarried girl indicates her closeness to the person she loves, and that the date for the marriage contract has been set. Interpretation of seeing manna and quail in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees quail in In her dream, this indicates the generosity of those who have extended and entered a new job. Also, seeing manna and quail in a dream indicates the goodness that each side seeks, and the abundance of sustenance and money. If an unmarried girl sees manna in her dream, this means that she will soon marry someone she loves and it will be A suitable groom for her. Interpretation of seeing aphids and quails in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that a bird is holding her, this indicates her closeness to pregnancy and her intense love for her husband. Also, the dream of aphids for a married woman indicates that her husband will enter a new job and have a lot of money. This vision may indicate the death of worries and sorrows, abandonment of sins, repentance to God Almighty, and adherence to religion, and God knows best. Seeing manna and quail in a dream indicates the lawful money that her husband will receive from his relative and friend. Interpretation of seeing manna and quail in a dream for a pregnant woman if she sees If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating manna and quail, this indicates her good condition and her adherence to religion, and God knows best. Also, seeing migratory birds in a dream indicates an abundance of food, high status, and the high status that the dreamer enjoys, and God knows best. Also, seeing a bird with manna and quail In a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates the ease of giving birth to a healthy baby free from all diseases, God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing manna and quail in a dream for a man. If a married man sees a quail in his dream, this indicates great generosity, great kindness and the high relationship that the man provides to earn his livelihood. As A young man’s vision of manna and quail in his dream indicates a good marriage to the girl he loves and the promotion he will see. Also, seeing quail in a dream indicates a permissible diet and an abundance of food, and the man must travel to work in one of the Arab countries and be happy. Interpretation of eating manna and quail in Dreaming: Seeing eating manna and quail in a dream means that the dreamer will face some problems and difficulties during this period of his life. Also, seeing manna and quail in a dream is a sign of nourishment, kindness, and blessing that the dreamer will receive. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and the team will Experts will reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing my friend in a single woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my girlfriend in a dream for a single woman: Sometimes it indicates a series of good news and sometimes the dream is a warning to the dreamer that something harmful will happen today. Through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss with you the interpretation in detail based on what was reported by major scholars, including in the interpretation Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation Seeing my girlfriend in a dream for single women When seeing my girlfriend in a dream for single women, translation scholars unanimously agreed that there is an interest that will bring them together in the coming period. The owner of the vision will fulfill many dreams and desires. If an unmarried woman sees that her friend appeared in ugly, dirty clothes, this is evidence that the fortuneteller will cause her great harm, and there is a great danger in her life. Between the dreamer and her friend to distinguish between them. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Shaheen is that the appearance of an unmarried friend in the form of a predatory animal is a warning to the dreamer of the need to be careful and wary of everyone around her, as they do not wish her well. Interpretation of seeing my friend in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirini. The appearance of one friend in a dream indicates that there is a lot of conversation within the dreamer. She wants to talk to her friend to feel comfortable and she also wants to get advice from someone she trusts. Seeing a close friend in a dream is a sign that the dreamer cannot make a decision except after consulting his girlfriend. If an unmarried woman sees that she is sitting with her close friend in a place they used to go, this indicates that she will receive a lot of good news that will make the girl live a lot. One of the happy things. If an unmarried woman sees her old boyfriend who has broken up with her for a long time, this means that their relationship together is stronger than it was in the past. Many pleasant things appear in the vision. If an unmarried woman sees that she is losing her way to reach her friend, then anxiety and pain will dominate the dreamer’s life, and he will not be able to deal with even the simplest problems. And you need the dreamer’s support.Interpretation of a dream about my only friend’s engagement: Seeing my friend participating in one dream means that the dreamer will prepare for her reasons, overcome the obstacles and obstacles in front of her, and will be able to achieve all goals and aspirations. A long time. In the event that he sees signs of sadness and unhappiness appearing on the face of a lonely friend at her engagement party, this means that the dreamer is officially linked to a person with whom he will not find happiness or comfort, so sooner or later he will decide to separate from him because she will find psychological comfort for herself. If the woman sees For a married woman, she is preparing to attend her friend’s engagement with good news, to receive a lot of good news, in addition to the end of problems and worries. Engagement in one dream is a sign. To start a new life and benefit from the mistakes of the past. Interpretation of a dream about my only friend getting married. If a single woman sees herself attending her friend’s wedding, this symbolizes the consolidation of their relationship together, knowing that this friend has feelings of love and gratitude and also wishes the dreamer all the best. A friend’s wedding in a dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing red hair in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Long and heavy hair indicates kindness, abundant nutrition and self-confidence. In this article we will explain in detail seeing red hair in a dream. We will also provide the interpretation of dyed hair for a girl and the interpretation of a dream about red hair for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing red hair in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is combing her hair and her hair was red in this vision. It appears that the single woman has boldness among people and loves to be famous. She is widely known among her friends and acquaintances. Also, seeing red hair in one dream shows that a woman will enjoy a lot of goodness, love, and happiness in the coming periods. And whoever sees in her dream that she has long red hair, this indicates that she will soon meet her husband and life partner, and he will be a husband. A good person who protects her from all harm. A woman who sees in her dream or sees that she is braiding herself. This vision indicated that he will fulfill a long-awaited desire, but it will come true soon. Hair in general in a dream indicates goodness, happiness, and joy according to the form of the hair. That is, if you see your hair and its mother Strong and beautiful, this dream indicates that the dreamer will become better. See also: Interpretation of dreaming of eating fat in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing red hair in a dream for a married woman. Red hair in a married woman’s dream indicates her married life, that is, when she sees the hair looking beautiful. Her married life was beautiful and wonderful. And the stronger it is, the better and stronger her relationship with her husband. The woman who sees in her dream that she is cutting some of her hair. This vision indicates that you will get rid of many of the problems that she will face soon. The hair in a married woman’s dream indicates her complete life, that is, the more hair More beautiful. This indicates that her life will improve, her situation will become more beautiful and she will become very confident in herself. A married woman who sees in her dream that her hair has turned black. This vision indicates that this woman will become more beautiful in the eyes of her husband and in the eyes of everyone who sees her. A woman’s beauty is summed up in her hair, and as we know, hair is a woman’s adornment, i.e. hair in a dream. It expresses beauty and adornment in reality and attracts attention. Interpretation of seeing red hair in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man dreams that his hair is red. This vision indicates that the dreamer will become better. And that the dreamer will feel many feelings of love and affection. Red hair in a man’s dream suggests that he will receive kindness and blessings from someone who loves him and feels friendly with him. And if you see in a dream that you see a young man with red hair, then this vision indicates that the owner of this hair is a special person for everyone. And this hair becomes an indicator of the strength of love that has existed between you and this person for a long time. Hair in a man’s dream also symbolizes a beautiful woman, and this vision indicates that the fortuneteller will soon marry a girl whom he admires and loves, and she will also love and appreciate him. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. The meaning of seeing red hair in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation

title: What is the interpretation and interpretation of the presence of suffocation in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of suffocation in a dream Drowning in a dream is one of the visions that disturb the dreamer, so he feels in his sleep that he is suffocating and unable to breathe, and he wakes up from his sleep with horror and fear, filling his heart with fear. Feeling suffocated...is good for the dreamer or warning him of something. Interpretation of a dream of suffocation and death: If a man sees in a dream that he feels suffocated until he died of suffocation and then came back to life, then this is a good vision for the dreamer, according to Ibn Sirin, who says that the dream indicates its owner. The vision will change the condition of poverty into wealth. According to Ibn Sirin, feeling suffocation in a dream is a sign that there is someone who does not wish him well and greets the dreamer. Seeing suffocation in a dream can indicate that the dreamer has suffered from envy or magic and at other times it is just a dream. From Satan, so the dreamer must spit to his left three times and seek refuge in God from the cursed Satan. Interpretation of a dream of suffocation by Ibn Sirin: The feeling of suffocation in a dream could be the result of psychological pressure that the dreamer is suffering from and thinking too much about something, or the result of psychological trauma that he was exposed to The dreamer, as a result, feels suffocated in the dream, and the cause of suffocation may be the result of a defect in the breathing process, so he should alert the person to wake up from his sleep and thus achieve his escape from death by suffocation or stroke - God forbid -. Choking someone in a dream depends on the interpretation of seeing someone. Strangled in a dream on the condition of the dreamer during that dream. As for seeing a person strangled in a dream and the person only feels pain, this vision is evidence that this person will be helped by God in paying off his debts and that he will help that person and get him out of trouble. Problems. Interpretation of a dream of suffocation for a single woman. Most translators and psychoanalysts reported that the feeling of suffocation in a dream can be seen by a dreamer who has stopped working. Psychologists said that in general the dreamer (male, female) if he dreams that he cannot breathe normally, this is a sign of Negative thoughts dominate his thinking and he cannot get them out of his mind, and difficult obstacles appear that delay him. An opportunity to fulfill his desires and dreams. Interpreters indicated that the dreamer who feels suffocated in his dream means that he suffers from a lack of social communication skills, as his communication with others within him is a major flaw and needs to be resolved because communication with people is a large part of success. Without cooperating with them in many aspects of life, a person will remain in his place without progress and success. If an unmarried woman is strangled in her view and succeeds from death, there are five signs agreed upon by jurists, the most prominent of which are the interpretations of this vision: First: In reality, she will be saved from great financial hardship. She was almost exposed to bankruptcy or debt, and if she saw in the vision that it was her father who was strangled, or a member of her family, and God saved him from death, the vision can be interpreted with the same interpretation. Second: Mercy will save her from the evil that led to her dismissal from work, and perhaps this evil was planned. By effective action, but God will overthrow the plots of all its enemies in the coming

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother sweeping the house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my mother sweeping the house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my mother sweeping the house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my mother sweeping the house in a dream may indicate that she will be able to get what she desires, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her mother sweeping the house, this may be A sign that she is getting rid of problems, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When a married man sees a mother sweeping her house, this may express her ability to get what she wants, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees her mother sweeping the house in a dream, this may indicate a collapse Problems, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of revealing my secret in a dream. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of revealing my secret in a dream can express the emergence of the truth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees revealed secrets, this may lead to calamity and calamity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees secrets in a dream, This may be evidence of the revelation of the truth, and God knows everything that is not seen. If a divorced woman sees the disclosure of secrets from another person, and that is true, then that may be a lie, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother getting married in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother getting married In a dream, a mother’s marriage can lead to comfort, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees his mother’s marriage in a dream, it may indicate comfort and tranquility, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married woman sees her mother marrying an unknown person in a dream, it may express some unpleasant things, and God knows best. I know everything that we did not see. When you see a mother marrying a mahram, it may lead to performing the rituals of Hajj or Umrah, and God Almighty knows. Interpretation of dreams: My mother gave me a gold ring in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: My mother gave me a gold ring in a dream. The goodness changes, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees that my mother gives me a gold ring In a dream, this may lead to goodness and sustenance, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman sees her mother giving her a gold ring in a dream, this may indicate things worthy of praise, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her mother giving her a gold ring in a dream, this may lead to blessings. And sustenance, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my mother talking to me on the phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother talking to me on the phone in a dream can lead to goodness and benefit that you obtain, and God knows everything. If a married woman sees a mother talking to her on the phone in a dream, this may be a sign of... Happy news, and God knows best. If a single girl sees her mother talking to her on the phone in a dream, this may indicate happiness and joy, God willing. When a married man sees his mother talking on the phone in a dream, this can lead to profits, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother Hitting my wife in a dream Interpretation of a dream: My mother hitting my wife in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a beating in a dream could be evidence of the benefit that the beating gets from the person who is being beaten, and God has all the benefits.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wound in the right breast in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dreaming about a wound in the right breast in a dream through our dreams website, and see all the opinions of dream interpreters of seeing a wound on the right breast in a dream. Dream interpretation of a wound in the right breast Seeing a wound on his chest in a dream indicates the presence of differences, problems, and crises in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a wound in the right breast in a dream symbolizes the coming of fears, sorrows, and disagreements with a close person. As for the blood that comes out of his chest in the dream, it indicates the dreamer’s morals and behavior, and the pregnant woman is evidence of her complaints. As for the blood that comes out of the breast in a dream for a married woman, it may indicate As bad. Spilling blood from the dead to the freed person may indicate rebellion and protest stemming from that. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a large breast. Menstrual towel in a dream. We provide you with an interpretation of a dream about a wound in the right breast in a dream, with greetings from the family of the place in the dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a camel according to Ibn Sirin. Common interpretations

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a camel in a dream and the opinion of dream interpreters, especially Ibn Sirin. See the common interpretations of seeing a camel in a dream for a single, married man and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a camelInterpretation scholars generally say that a dream about a camel indicates great patience, strength, bearing responsibility, and enduring hardships that one cannot Anyone else bears it. Whoever dreams that he is the king of the camel will triumph over the enemy of power and prestige. Whoever sees that he has a camel and holds its reins and drags it, his dreams indicate that his superiors will follow him and his opinion. And whoever sees that he is taking care of camels, this indicates that he has taken a position. See also :Seeing a horse in a dream. Seeing a camel in a dream. Whoever sees that he got off the camel’s back, this is surrender to his distress, relief from his distress, and shows joy and happiness. Whoever sees that he gets the best of camels, this shows his permanent wealth and will never lack it forever. Whoever sees that he is riding an Arabian camel. He performs Hajj in his Sunnah. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a camel: Whoever sees that he has slaughtered a camel or sees a camel slaughtered, his dream may indicate that he will find a treasure, or obtain a lot of goodness or a lot of profit. As for whoever sees that he is distributing camel meat, the dream may indicate that he He will receive an inheritance that is very good for him. As for seeing the blood of a camel, it indicates happiness and joy, and hearing the good news and benefiting from it. Seeing a camel in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a camel in a dream means that she will marry an important man. Her driving the camel and his obedience to her indicate that her husband will be kind and obedient to her. It may also indicate some difficulties in her life that will end soon. Perhaps it indicates her patience and endurance in life and not giving up despite her bad life. Perhaps it indicates good management in the affairs of her life. See also: Seeing a donkey in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about riding a camel for a married woman. Camel in a dream for a married woman Her husband and husband appear in the state because he sees that the camel is strong, weak, obedient or otherwise. Riding a camel for a married woman indicates that her husband is patient with her and gives her her rights without any deficiency. If a married woman dreams that she is riding an obedient camel that moves her in any direction she wants, this indicates that her husband He is obedient to her or that she is controlling him. And if she sees that she is riding a camel and her husband is absent, then the dream indicates his safe return from the journey. Interpretation of a dream about a camel for a married man: seeing a married camel indicates marriage to another woman. And whoever thinks that he rode a camel indicates his marriage to a woman he loves. He saw a camel and its calf marrying a divorced woman or a widow with a child. The camel can refer to the wife, so whoever believes that the camel is out of control should divorce his wife. Whoever sees in a dream that his camel has been slaughtered, his vision indicates the death of his wife. Distributing camel meat indicates... Dividing his wife’s money. Whoever rides a camel upside down has committed immorality with his wife, that is, having intercourse with her anally. Whoever thinks he is milking a camel, this indicates that he has obtained a lot of food and money from a sultan or someone who holds a position. The camel also refers to a married man’s maid. Seeing a herd of camels indicates that a married man will get what he wants in terms of money, children, and happiness in life. Read any

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a girl: Seeing a girl getting hit in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a father hitting his daughter in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a girl hitting her mother Hitting her in the face in a dream Slapping a hand in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a mother hitting her daughter Beating with a stick in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of a dream about the death of a man hitting his daughter Hitting a woman in a dream Beating: It is good for the one who hits the attacker with the hand, unless it becomes clear that he is hitting him with a stick, in which case it is clear that He considers it good and it is not enough for him. Whoever dreams that an angel hits him with a stick will cover him. Whoever hits him on the back will pay off his debt. Whoever hits him on his disability will marry him. Whoever hits him with a stick will hit him with something he hates. It is said that hitting indicates change, and it is said that hitting is a warning. Whoever dreams that he hits a person on the head with a slingshot and it affects his head and the effect remains on him, then he wants to go to his boss. If he hits his eyelid, he wants to violate his religion. If he plucks his eyelids, he calls it heresy. If he hits his skull, his change is over and the killer will achieve his goal. If she hits his earlobe or cuts it and blood flows from it, then she is the victim’s daughter. It has been said that each member indicates a relative, which is the interpretation of that member. Some interpreters said: Beating is a supplication, so whoever sees that he hits a man asks him to do so. Whoever dreams that a man hits him on the head with a hammer and a raspberry on his head and his mark remains, then he wants his boss to leave. Whoever takes off his eyelids and then invites him to heresy. Whoever hits his skull, his expression has ended and the striker has achieved his goal. He hit him on his earlobe and blood came out of it. He hits the victim’s daughter. Whoever dreams that he is hit on the head with something twisted, then he hits him with something that will hurt him, as well as a whip, a penis, or something twisted and the like. And whoever of you sees that he was hit in the eye, this indicates his negligence and that he will wake up from This is negligence, and God knows best. Jaber Al-Maghribi said: Whoever sees that a person has hit him and does not know who hit him and the reasons for hitting him, he will take goodness and money and wear new clothes. In wood, it appears that he prepares him for good, but does not repay him. And whoever is beaten will die, it indicates an increase in his debt, and the fulfillment of his debt, and in explaining some phrases that hitting is a supplication, so (whoever sees that he is hitting a man, then he will ask for him, or perhaps. The dream of being beaten, if you do it by his hand or on his command, then this indicates the decision and behavior in matters such as seeing the pregnant woman being beaten in the stomach is good news for getting rid of the pregnancy safely and in the health and well-being of him, and for a son who will comfort the heart of his mother and father, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that he was beaten with whips without tying his hands and feet, Whether there is blood or not, this is the acquisition of forbidden money, especially if his body is stained with blood. Whoever dreams of being beaten without a whip and the marks of the beating remain on him, then he is doing well. Whoever did not leave his fingerprints on him, it was a word, and whoever sees that he is beating a dead person and the dead person merely beats him, this indicates The condition of the dead person will be good in the afterlife. And whoever sees that he beat him while he was folded, he speaks evil and regrets it. Whoever dreams that he is being beaten and does not see, he is in a better condition as long as he is not tied up or oppressed. Whoever hits him on the back will repay his debt. Whoever hits him on the buttocks will marry him. Whoever hits him is affected by what he hates, and it is said. Beating shows change and can show preaching.Interpretation of a dream about hitting a brother - YouTubeInterpretation of hitting in a dream - YouTubeInterpretation of dreams about being beaten - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the color yellow in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing the color yellow in a dream, and yellow is the color that delights the eye, and it has many interpretations between good and evil, it can show envy and resentment and it can show joy and pleasure, and if the color is light yellow, then this indicates illness, troubles and troubles. Seeing clothes with a color that appears light yellow or pale yellow also indicates the great reputation that the fortuneteller has. Seeing the pale yellow color in a dream is not good and indicates illness or financial hardship and may indicate the presence of a bad person in her life. Seeing the yellow color in a dream The yellow color in a dream has many connotations between good and evil. It can mean high status, joy, pleasure, success, and reconciliation. It can indicate illness, envy, malice, or hatred. It may indicate an excellent future in a young man’s dream. It also indicates happy news in a girl’s dream. Seeing the color yellow in a dream, and if a married woman sees the color yellow in Her dream, this indicates joy, happiness and enjoyment in her life. Yellow clothes in a dream If the dreamer sees that he is wearing yellow clothes, this is good, especially if the yellow color is pleasing to the eye and the dress is new like a man’s shirt or a girl’s dress. This is good and indicates good omens and good news. The yellow veil in a girl’s dream indicates a high status. Seeing light or light yellow clothes also indicates the dreamer’s wide fame. Interpretation of a yellow blouse in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman wearing a yellow blouse indicates a lot of happiness. Goodness, food and stability in her married life. If she is wearing yellow shoes or a dress, it is better to hear about her soon. Seeing yellow color in a dream Seeing pale yellow color is not good in a dream and indicates illness or financial distress and may indicate the presence of a malicious person in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow veil: A light, bright, or bright yellow color, such as the color of the sun or roses, is considered an excellent vision and expresses the stable psychological state of the individual or the viewer. Also, seeing yellow shoes for a girl, married or pregnant, indicates a safe life, great power, and the fulfillment of a wish. If If the yellow color is present in the dress, coat or shirt, this is a vision that indicates good luck in life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a yellow dress: Seeing a married woman wearing a yellow dress indicates an imminent pregnancy. This also means happy news. This vision for a girl indicates her academic excellence if she Student. Seeing the color yellow in a dream. If he is an employee, he will be promoted to a higher rank. Seeing a girl’s yellow embroidered dress also indicates that her engagement is approaching. Dreaming of a long yellow dress for pregnant women. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a yellow dress means that childbirth will be easy and a healthy baby will be happy with it. Color Yellow or dress during sleep means, and the light yellow color indicates illness, inconvenience, and fatigue. A yellow dress for men in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the light yellow color in a dream indicates success.

title: Learn about the symbol of the wristwatch in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A wristwatch in a dream is one of the dreams that many dreamers have and it is not known whether it indicates good or bad, but this depends on the condition and type of the dreamer and we will learn in detail about the different connotations of this topic in the article. A wristwatch in a dream A wristwatch appears in a dream The dreamer has his work in this world and the way he manages life. Dreaming about a wristwatch symbolizes that the dreamer sees it as waiting for something and wanting it badly. When the dreamer sees the correct wristwatch in his dream, it means that he is regular in his life and that he is on the right path, but if That was not true, it meant that he was late in doing many of the tasks he had. It must end. Seeing the dreamer watching the wristwatch while he is in a state of fear and anxiety means that he is waiting for the outcome of something. As for seeing the wristwatch lost in the dreamer’s dream, it is not an unpleasant vision at all, because it mostly indicates the death of someone close to him, It is also an indication of the lack of work. As for seeing a wristwatch in a dream that it has no hand, this is a sign of the loss of the dream and the goal that the dreamer had planned for some time, and some scholars also interpreted it as problems and disagreements with the family. Seeing a digital wristwatch in a dream and not wearing it in reality symbolizes that he is desperately waiting for something and must take precautions so as not to miss any opportunity. Seeing a familiar wristwatch in a dream indicates promises he has made to others. Seeing a wristwatch And it was tight for the dreamer in the dream, indicating the great responsibilities that fall on his shoulders. As for seeing someone wearing more than a wrist watch in a dream, this indicates a lot of goodness and traveling abroad in search of a new job and more money. A wrist watch in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpreted by Ibn Sirin Seeing a wristwatch in a dream with different indicators indicates good and evil. The dreamer seeing a watch that has been adjusted and has a beautiful shape, indicates that the dreamer is a person who enjoys a stable life without problems. As for a wrist watch that has not been adjusted and has an ugly appearance in a person’s dream, this indicates On the crises and problems that the dreamer faces in his life at this time. Seeing a slow wrist watch in a dream shows the experiences that the person faces, but seeing it is accurate and advanced, then this is a sign of success, stability, and freedom from the problems that plague life. Some scholars have explained that seeing a wrist watch In a dream, it could be a sign of the Day of Resurrection and the necessity of getting closer to God and staying away from everything that angers Him. Seeing a watch in a dream symbolizes a person who is suffering from problems and crises in his life. A wristwatch in Al-Osaimi’s dream. The great scientist Fahd Al-Osaimi interprets seeing a wristwatch in a dream that was human. He keeps it and has not taken advantage of it as a constant in his life and has no aspirations to achieve it. Also, if the dreamer sees a wristwatch ticking in a dream, this indicates waiting and anticipation for something to happen. Dreaming of a wristwatch gift in a dream indicates that the dreamer cares about the pleasures of the mortal world and does not care about With his duties
